author: cms-trackeralign
body:
#### PR description:

The goal of this PR is to introduce `PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb`: a new High Granularity Tracker Alignment Prompt Calibration Loop combining MinumumBias and  Z   data.
The driving reason to include di-muon resonant data is to allow better constraint on certain systematic distortion of the detector affecting e.g. the track longitudinal impact parameter (see e.g. [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1180066/contributions/5698452/attachments/2767106/4820182/TKDPGReport_CMSWeekDec23.pdf#page=16)), thus effectively reducing the need for re-reconstruction passes during Run 3 (some more discussion on the topic available [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1336703/contributions/5668052/attachments/2756065/4798880/TkAl_PPD_workshop_2023.pdf)).
This development is co-authored by @dmeuser .

#### PR validation:

Extensive tests have been run using an [earlier version of this branch](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/master...mmusich:cmssw:devel_ZMuMuInHGPCL_from-CMSSW_13_3_0_pre4) using the recipe [*] and leading to the results discussed in [this presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1363140/contributions/5759752/attachments/2781254/4847742/TkAl_16_01_2023_HG_PCL_Zmumu_Studies.pdf).
Additionally I have run successfully `runTheMatrix.py -l 1001,1001.2,1001.3,138.5 --ibeos`.

[*]
```
cmsrel CMSSW_13_3_0_pre4
cd CMSSW_13_3_0_pre4/src/
cmsenv
git cms-init
git cms-merge-topic mmusich:devel_ZMuMuInHGPCL_from-CMSSW_13_3_0_pre4
scramv1 b -j 20
cmsenv
voms-proxy-init -voms cms
cmsDriver.py testReAlCaZMuMu -s ALCA:PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb --conditions 130X_dataRun3_Prompt_v2 --scenario pp --data --era Run3_2023 --datatier ALCARECO --eventcontent ALCARECO --processName=ReAlCa -n 10000 --dasquery='file dataset=/Muon0/Run2023D-TkAlZMuMu-PromptReco-v1/ALCARECO run=370300' --customise_commands='process.ALCARECOTkAlMinBiasFilterForSiPixelAliHG.throw = False;process.ALCARECOTkAlZMuMuFilterForSiPixelAli.throw = False'
rm -fr *.dat
mv PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb.root PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb_0.root
cmsDriver.py testReAlCaMinBias -s ALCA:PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb --conditions 130X_dataRun3_Prompt_v2 --scenario pp --data --era Run3_2023 --datatier ALCARECO --eventcontent ALCARECO --processName=ReAlCa -n 10000 --dasquery='file dataset=/HLTPhysics/Run2023D-TkAlMinBias-PromptReco-v1/ALCARECO run=370300' --customise_commands='process.ALCARECOTkAlMinBiasFilterForSiPixelAliHG.throw = False;process.ALCARECOTkAlZMuMuFilterForSiPixelAli.throw = False'
mv PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb.root PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb_1.root
cmsDriver.py stepHarvest -s ALCAHARVEST:SiPixelAliHGCombined --conditions 130X_dataRun3_Prompt_v2 --scenario pp --data --era Run3_2023 -n -1 --filein file:PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb_0.root,file:PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHGComb_1.root 
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, not to be backported (assuming integration in CMSSW_14_0_X, targeting 2024 pp data-taking).
